author: Russ Thayer
comment: No way to unsubscribe from emails as far as I can see. Fills up my inbox like crazy when adding new media. Needs more user controls on how to receive notifications.

reply.author: Immersion Design Studio
reply.content: The only reason you should be receiving emails is if the owner of the server you share has you on the list for email notifications as well. Simply ask them to remove your account from the forwarding list.

title: Needs more controls

author: Claudio F. Barbano
comment: How to make it work?? Does not contact my plex server. I have a fully paid plex-pass.  WHat does it mean "Requires shared library owners to have nuVue and Pay-It-Forward license" ?????

reply.author: Immersion Design Studio
reply.content: nuVue is not an official Plex product, so your Plex Pass has no bearing on its operation. nuVue Shared is a free version of the paid nuVue app that users who do not have their own Plex server and only share others' libraries can use. If you have your own Plex server, you will need to use the paid version of nuVue.

author: Alex tv
comment: Ok well i been testing this app for couple of hours now, you have to set everything on the settings like refresh time and to show  your preferences as for just playing or added items, I set mine to whats playing FYI it wont sync to your phone automatically it takes between 4-6 min to send you the notification to your phone on who is playing what.  I personally used it to have more control over my plex server since I found a cheater in my friends list he shared his user name to various people so this app is perfect it tells me who is playing what and from wich system they are playing it from.
